biotools.summary:
A sequence-based meta-predictor for improving the prediction of phage virion proteins using effective feature representation.

PVPred-SCM: Improved Prediction and Analysis of Phage Virion Proteins Using Scoring Card Method.

In this work, we developed a novel PVP predictor named PVPred-SCM which is an efficient and interpretable method for predicting and analyzing PVPs.

bioschemas.name: Meta-iPVP
